group_1.textRight: If I hadn't become a Magical Girl!
I wouldn't have to worry about all this!

group_1.textLeft: Taking out your frustrations on the@Witches again?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.@Got a problem with that?

group_1.textLeft: My only concern is that fighting when you are@upset adds increased risk.
It's also just not good for you.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so you're here to lecture me?
Even after you said you didn't care@what I did, as long as I hunted Witches?
Not to mention[chara:303100:lipSynch_0]...

group_1.textCenter: Looks like another [chara:300300:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Magical Girl got@here first.

group_1.textRight: This is [chara:303100:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]all [se:4013_equip_arms_compact]your fault!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Oh, Miyako-senpai.

group_1.textRight: What're you acting all cool for?!
Why did you agree to become a Magical Girl?!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, Miyako-senpai!@[se:7205_magic_girl]You're crazy strong!

group_1.textRight: Do you always [se:7205_magic_girl]fight like a maniac?

group_1.textLeft: Uhm…

group_1.textRight: That's a good way to get yourself hurt.@It's only a matter of time.

group_1.textLeft: Hey!@That's exactly what that fuzzball said!

group_1.textRight: What? Fuzzball...?

group_1.textLeft: You know, Kyubey! The fuzzball!

group_1.textRight: Augh...@Kyubey?[chara:300301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]
Knowing I said the same thing he did kinda@makes me sick...

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha!

group_1.textRight: Okay, let's just forget all that for now.
Either way, you know you don't have@to fight like a crazy person, right?

group_1.textLeft: But that's how I blow off steam.

group_1.textRight: Huh?! Excuse me?![chara:300301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]
Look...
Little piece of advice. You should @find another way to blow off steam.

group_1.textLeft: I know, but I wasn't so stressed out@before he made me a Magical Girl!
And fighting Witches is, like, the @only thing that helps me feel better.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean, "he made you?"
You chose this, didn't you?
Okay, back up.@First of all, what's got you so down?
You got your wish, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: And judging from our last conversation,@I'm guessing you wished for love.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…

group_1.textRight: So what's the problem?
Why aren't you bouncing off the @walls with happiness right now?

group_1.textLeft: Because…
Because it's all a lie! It's all fake!
It only happened because of that@stupid contract!
It's just...
It's like they just think they like me,@but that's not how they actually feel.

group_1.textRight: Which begs the question...
Why did you become a Magical Girl in the@first place?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
It wouldn't have happened any other way...

group_1.textRight: Why not...?
